name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Platform Engineer with 8 years of experience, I possess a robust understanding of advanced algorithms, data structures, and cryptographic primitives, essential for developing high-performance blockchain systems. My expertise includes programming in **Go**, **Rust**, **C++**, and **Scala**, which I leverage to create efficient and scalable solutions that align with the latest in blockchain technology such as **EVM**, **Solidity**, and **Foundry**. 
I have successfully implemented CI/CD processes and release pipelines, enhancing the observability and environment orchestration of software deployments. My strong technical foundation is complemented by hands-on experience in microservices architecture and event-driven systems, ensuring robust application development. 
Additionally, I excel in building high-performance applications in the healthcare and finance sectors with a tech stack that includes **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **Flutter**, **React**, **Next.js**, **Node.js**, and **FastAPI**. My commitment to security and compliance is evident in my experience with industry standards like HIPAA, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. I am proficient in integrating real-time data processing and predictive analytics into enterprise-grade platforms, further showcasing my dedication to delivering cutting-edge technology solutions.
